spothunt

Class GoalSpot

  • java.lang.Object
    • spothunt.GoalSpot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spot

    public class GoalSpot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Spot
    This class takes care of the GoalSpot.
    It controls a Player (e.g. setLocation, getX, toString) and it holds the value for x and y.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jeroen

    • Constructor Detail

      • GoalSpot

        public GoalSpot(Playfield playfield,
                int x,
                int y)
        The constructor of GoalSpot. This will link the spot to a Playfield and set it to its start location [x,y].
        Parameters:
        playfield - the Playfield it is linked to.
        x - the x coordinate of the GoalSpot.
        y - the y coordinate of the GoalSpot.
